content:
I think that's a fantastic idea! The "Peachy Keen" drink sounds delicious and thoughtful, and the peach garnish with mint will add a lovely touch. The combination of peach puree, champagne, and grenadine will create a sweet and fruity flavor profile that's perfect for a celebratory drink.

Using your mom's favorite flavor as inspiration is a wonderful way to make the drink personal and meaningful. I'm sure she'll appreciate the thought and attention to detail you've put into creating a custom drink just for her.

To take it to the next level, you could also consider serving the drink in a champagne flute or a wine glass with a peach-themed rim, such as a sugar rim or a peach-scented rim. This will add an extra touch of elegance and whimsy to the drink.

Remember to have fun and be creative with the presentation and serving style. You could also consider serving the drink in a signature glass or a customized cup with a special message or your parents' names. This will make the drink even more memorable and special for the occasion.

I think you're off to a great start, and I'm sure your parents will love the "Peachy Keen" drink!
